name: Hobble
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Jump - Space

I made this game for the 8 Bits To Infinity: Run Jam. It incorporates "run" because it is an infinite runner game like Jetpack Joyride. I hope you enjoy and any feedback is appreciated! 

Player asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-character-sprite-animatio...

UI text and buttons: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-free-pixel-art-styled-...

Coin: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-animated-coin-2d-rpk-22...

Spikes and Saws: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360
